WRITING.TITLE: a bit over two years ago, my sister almost died of anorexia and was sent to a treatment facility for what was supposed to be for two months, no visits. She had to secretly contact us to have us come get her. AMA
WRITING.TEXT: My sister was diagnosed with anorexia in October of 2014 and stayed in the hospital for about two weeks. she was then moved to an extremely strict treatment facility in Connecticut. she had to secretly contact us to get us to help her leave. about six months prior, my parents had gotten divorced.
